attributes.action: consider awarding a knigthood to Derek Dooley for services to football
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Derek Dooley is unique in Sheffield football. He is perhaps the only person to be associated with both Sheffield clubs to still be held in great regard and with much affection by the fans of both clubs.


http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Derek_Dooley
